title: The World Is Big And Salvation Lurks Eng Subs
description:
The World Is Big And Salvation Lurks

Following a severe car accident in which both his parents are killed, Sashko is taken to hospital with amnesia. Sashko's grandfather, Bai Dan, decides to help him restore his identity. As they ride on a tandem bicycle through the Balkan countryside, Sashko begins to recall snippets of the past. Winner of the Special Jury Award at the 2008 Warsaw International Film Festival. Directed by Stephan Komandarev and stars Miki Manojilovic, Carlo Lubjek and Ana Papadopulu. 

From Bulgaria, in Bulgarian, German and Italian  

Subtitles by SBS AU TV
